page.title: 12Employment in Pontrhydyfen.
page.content: There are no large scale employers in our study area. Apart from local businesses and essential services, most people travel out of the area for work. Our survey on employment in Pontrhydyfen showed that of all those over the age of 16, 5% were still in full-time education, 28% were retired, 47% in Full-time employment,10% in part-time employment and 10% unemployed. Of those in employment, 7% actually work in the village. These would be employed in the three local shops, schools, clubs and chicken farm.
